title: Sony Xperia 1 IV goes official priced at $1,600 w/ Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, headphone jack, more
content:
Although a small player in the Android smartphone space, for enthusiasts the brand-new Sony Xperia 1 IV could provide everything they are hoping for in a smartphone — but for a hefty asking price.

more…

The post Sony Xperia 1 IV goes official priced at $1,600 w/ Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, headphone jack, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: For Android enthusiasts the brand-new Sony Xperia 1 IV could provide everything they are hoping for in a smartphone but for a whopping $1,600.
